name: No Waste
description:
This is my first ever completed game. Made with Gamemaker 8.1.  Completed and published May 01 2013. I learn a lot with this game.

No Waste is a small space strategy/trade game. You are a robot spaceship who must survive by converting resources into a pure source of energy: Trisanium.  These resources can be acquired by harvesting, trading or simply taken on enemy unit defeated on turn by turn combat. Upgrade your  biological skills, upgrade your mineral structure and buy up to 15 differents techologies to help you on your purpose.

(A lot of spelling errors... sorry for that...)
